label: uncl4505
comment: Code specifying the type of request for credit cover.

values.label: Multi-currency credit cover
values.comment: Invoices in currencies other than the currency of the credit cover are expected.

values.label: Request increased limit
values.comment: Seller requests increase of existing limit.

values.label: Request for preliminary assessment
values.comment: Request for information to be used during negotiation with prospective clients (sellers).

values.label: Request for new account only
values.comment: Request for opening new account only.

values.label: Cancellation
values.comment: Request to cancel an existing credit cover.

values.label: Reduction
values.comment: Request to reduce an existing credit cover.

values.label: Prolongation of credit cover
values.comment: Request to prolong an existing credit cover.
